templates.name: conveyor_industrial.straight-conveyor_template
templates.svgTemplate:
<g class="{{componentClass}} {{category}}-component">

  <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="30" 
        fill="{{fillColor}}" stroke="{{strokeColor}}" stroke-width="{{strokeWidth}}"
        class="conveyor-belt"/>
  <rect x="5" y="5" width="190" height="20" 
        fill="none" stroke="{{strokeColor}}" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"
        class="conveyor-direction"/>
  <text x="100" y="15" text-anchor="middle" 
        dominant-baseline="middle" font-size="{{fontSize}}" fill="{{textColor}}">{{label}}</text>
</g>

templates.name: equipment_perspective.motor_template
templates.svgTemplate:
<g class="{{componentClass}} {{category}}-component">

  <circle cx="30" cy="30" r="25" 
          fill="{{fillColor}}" stroke="{{strokeColor}}" stroke-width="{{strokeWidth}}"
          class="equipment-body"/>
  <circle cx="30" cy="30" r="15" 
          fill="none" stroke="{{strokeColor}}" stroke-width="2"
          class="equipment-center"/>
  <text x="30" y="30" text-anchor="middle" 
        dominant-baseline="middle" font-size="{{fontSize}}" fill="{{textColor}}">{{label}}</text>
</g>
